__e: Yeah, sometimes I did 'cause it was Ohicago, and it was cold... so sometimes I wore a hat.
The old... The guy... Um... in the hat?
Something wrong, sir? That picture of mine, the one she's madly in love with--
Thank you for not wearing your stupid hat.
I know you told him that you didn't have the hat because you didn't want to see him again, and more sympathetic I could not be but I really do need to have the hat back.
Is my life going to be in danger again? You don't have to wear the hat.
Take off your cap and stand up.
Well, you know, how about scraping? Why don't you go out
- Take off your cap when talking to me!
All I'm saying is I'm gonna go get sleep!
If we leave now we can get some sleep.
You had a good night's sleep, and we've only been on the road a couple hours.

I was thinking about that blind lieutenant and your young friend, charlie constable, with the blood on his hat, and... and then sometime during the night they stopped coming, and it got quiet on the road there, it got real quiet.
"When I hate you, I shall wear my cap."
Meanwhile I have the hat and you don't.
